servinfo.title: Driver Air Bag (Inflator) Module Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: When handling an air bag (inflator) module, be sure to read Precautions on Handling and Storage of Air Bag System Components and observe each instruction. Failure to follow them could cause a damage to the air bag (inflator) module or result in personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Disable air bag system. Refer to Disabling Air Bag System .
Loosen driver air bag (inflator) module mounting bolts (1) till it turns freely, pull them out and fix them to bolt clamps.
Remove air bag (inflator) module from steering wheel.
Disconnect driver air bag (inflator) module connector (1) of driver air bag (inflator) module as shown in figure.

s2.ptxt: With lock button unlocked, disconnect connector.

s1.ptxt: Connect driver air bag (inflator) module connector (1) to driver air bag (inflator) module (2) securely as shown in figure.
Install driver air bag (inflator) module (1) to steering wheel (2), taking care so that no part of wire harness is caught between them.
Make sure that clearance between module (1) and steering wheel (2) is uniform all the way.
Tighten left side bolt (3) of driver air bag (inflator) module first and then right side bolt (4).

torqueitem.t-part: Driver air bag (inflator) module mounting bolt

s1.ptxt: Enable air bag system. Refer to Enabling Air Bag System .
